title: How often does the patch change in pro play?
body: I started watching during last year's world's so this is still pretty new to me.  How often do they change patches?

replies.body: LCS is one week behind live.
They also aren't allowed to pick new champions right away when the new patch hits. I think it's like 2 weeks but I'm not positive about that
They are only a week or so behind Live's patch environment as of this season.
